Chris,
Yeah, we don't have [dedicated copy event APIs](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/handle-global-events/reference-global-system-events#contentitemevents). Partially because cloning ("copying") is only possible with web pages and emails. There is no clone feature for Content hub items, yet. It's *possible* that we'll add clone events for all content items when cloning is available in the Content hub.
What prevents you from using the other content item lifecycle events? Is there something unique about your business logic that behaves differently for cloned items?
